setImage() - Method in class Animation
Set the Image of the object depending on time elapsed since last scene
shape - Variable in class Tile
The Shape of the Tile in order to determine collision
ShotSound - Static variable in class Sound
 
Skull - Class in <Unnamed>

Sleeper - Static variable in class Sound
 
Snakey - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the Class for the Monster represented as a Green Worm in The Game.
Snakey(int, int, Tile.ID) - Constructor for class Snakey
 
Sound - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the Class where Sounds are played from and loaded.Since we do not want to keep loading sound file every time its needed, we instead load all sounds at the start of the game and get a reference to it so we can play the sound when needed without latency caused by constantly loading a file.
Sound(String) - Constructor for class Sound
Load the given sound specified by Filename in the Memory
StageMusic - Static variable in class Sound
 
start() - Method in class StopWatch
Start the timer
step - Variable in class Character
Maximum distance the Character is allowed at once
StopWatch - Class in <Unnamed>
Utility Class based on StopWatch from C#.Since we need accurate Timers to refresh screen hence the use of nano even though we are requesting Millis.
StopWatch() - Constructor for class StopWatch
